\subsection{Detailed Description}
This class is a specialisation of the \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer}{GContainer} and mainly differs from it in that you don't have to specify a position for the child when you add it. It will arrange the objects itself in the table as you add them

\hypertarget{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GTable_a6069509b3c789fb805cb5fba97d088ae}{
\index{OpenViBEApplications::GTable@{OpenViBEApplications::GTable}!setDimParameters@{setDimParameters}}
\index{setDimParameters@{setDimParameters}!OpenViBEApplications::GTable@{OpenViBEApplications::GTable}}
\subsubsection[{setDimParameters}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}virtual void OpenViBEApplications::GTable::setDimParameters (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf BoxDimensions}}]{dim}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily  \mbox{[}inline, virtual\mbox{]}}}}
\label{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GTable_a6069509b3c789fb805cb5fba97d088ae}
Sets the x, y, height, width and depth parameters of the object. It also sets the internal state of the object to changed. It will also call deleteAndCreateGLResources because the code needs to be rewritten to graphical memory with the new dimensions and thus new resources need to be created and the old ones deleted 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em dim} & the dimensions of the object (in OpenGL units, \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1P300MainContainer}{P300MainContainer} redefines the space so that 1 unit is 1 pixel). \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}


Reimplemented from \hyperlink{classOpenViBEApplications_1_1GContainer_ab02678f9c301ae4e78ca2514a062c645}{OpenViBEApplications::GContainer}.
